rules_text:
Sentinels of Canica Strait enters the battlefield with three marble counters on it.
{2}, {T}, Remove a marble counter from Sentinels of Canica Strait: Draw a card.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Sentinels of Canica Strait: Create two 3/3 colorless Warrior artifact creature tokens. Activate only if Sentinels of Canica Strait has no marble counters on it.
